frameset.edef: to apply assiduously, devote all one's efforts

role.argrole: the agent putting in the effort
the kind of effort put forth

example.parse: (S (CONJ ف) (SBAR-ADV (SUB_CONJ اذا) (S (VP (PV+PVSUFF_SUBJ:3MS كان) (NP-1 (NP (DET+NOUN+NSUFF_MASC_PL_NOM المسؤولون) (DET+ADJ+NSUFF_MASC_PL_NOM الرئيسيون)) (PP (PREP عن) (NP (NOUN+CASE_DEF_GEN تحرير) (NP (DET+NOUN+NSUFF_FEM_PL+CASE_DEF_GEN الطلبات)))) (PP (PREP في) (NP (NOUN+NSUFF_FEM_SG+CASE_DEF_GEN مكتبة) (NP (PUNC ") (NP (NOUN_PROP بوردرز)) (PUNC ") (CONJ او) (PUNC ") (NP (NOUN_PROP بارنز) (NOUN_PROP اندنوبل)) (PUNC "))))) (VP (PRT (NEG_PART لا)) (IV3MP+IV+IVSUFF_SUBJ:MP_MOOD:I يظهرون) (NP-SBJ (-NONE- *T*-1)) (NP-OBJ (NP (NOUN+CASE_INDEF_ACC قدراً) (ADJ+CASE_INDEF_ACC كبيراً)) (PP (PREP من) (NP (DET+NOUN+NSUFF_FEM_SG+CASE_DEF_GEN الحماسة))) (PP (PREP ب) (NP (NOUN+CASE_DEF_GEN إزاء) (NP (NOUN+NSUFF_FEM_SG+CASE_INDEF_GEN مخطوطة) (ADJ+NSUFF_FEM_SG+CASE_INDEF_GEN معينة))))))))) (PUNC ,) (NP-PRD (NP (DET+ADJ_COMP الاحرى)) (PP (PREP ب) (NP (PRON_1P نا)))) (SBAR-SBJ (SUB_CONJ ان) (S (VP (IV1P+IV+IVSUFF_MOOD:S نمعن) (NP-SBJ (-NONE- *)) (PP-CLR (PREP في) (NP (DET+NOUN+CASE_DEF_GEN التفكير))) (NP-TMP (NOUN+CASE_DEF_ACC قبل) (SBAR (SUB_CONJ أن) (S (VP (IV1P+IV+IVSUFF_MOOD:S نقرّر) (NP-SBJ (-NONE- *)) (NP-OBJ (NP (NOUN+CASE_DEF_ACC هدر) (NP (NOUN+CASE_DEF_GEN رأس) (NP (NOUN+CASE_DEF_GEN مال) (NP (POSS_PRON_1P نا))))) (PP (PREP على) (NP (NOUN+CASE_DEF_GEN تكاليف) (NP (NOUN+CASE_DEF_GEN نشر) (NP (POSS_PRON_3FS ها))))))))))))) (PUNC .))

arg.g: before wasting our capital on the costs of publishing

example.arg: قبل أن نقرر هدر رأس مالنا على تكاليف نشرها
